overview:
Ms. Fray joined SonicRecruitâ€™s sales team in 1998 where she brought in some of the largest accounts, including Fortune 500 companies. For the past few years, Ms. Fray has developed, trained and managed SonicRecruitâ€™s Client Services division, earning it a reputation for excellence.

Ms. Fray honed her consulting skills while previously employed by Deloitte & Touche Consulting Group. She also possesses a wealth of experience in both corporate & agency recruiting.

Ms. Fray earned a Bachelor’s Degree in Sales and marketing from Northern Illinois University in DeKalb, IL. In addition to her duties with SonicRecruit, Ms. Fray is active in volunteer work with both Project Open Hand preparing meals for people that are homebound due to illness, and Larkin Street Youth Services, a program focused on helping kids, ages 12-24, off the street.
